parameters.name: max_open_connections
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of open connections to the database.

parameters.name: max_idle_connections
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of idle connections to the database.

parameters.name: max_connection_lifetime
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum amount of time a connection may be reused.

parameters.description: The root credential username used in the connection URL.
